SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, code, description, product_type, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, afa_product_id FROM elp_afa_product WHERE afa_product_id = :afa_product_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select p.afa_product_id,p.dealer_id,p.code,p.description,p.product_type from ELP_AFA_PRODUCT p, elp_dealer d where p.dealer_id = d.dealer_id and p.dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_afa_product SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, code = :code, description = :description, product_type = :product_type, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE afa_product_id = :afa_product_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_afa_product ( dealer_id, code, description, product_type, created_by, afa_product_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :code, :description, :product_type, :created_by, :afa_product_id )
SQL.GET_DUPLICATE_PRODUCT_COUNT: select count(*) from elp_afa_product where dealer_id = :dealer_id and upper(code) =:CODE and afa_product_id <> :afa_product_id
